import{accountOverviewCardVarient,currencySymbolGenerator}from'utilities/Generator';import FEIBIconButton from'components/elements/FEIBIconButton';import{MoreIcon}from'assets/images/icons';import AccountCardWrapper from'./CreditCard.style';/*
* ==================== AccountCard 組件說明 ====================
* 帳戶總覽組件
* ==================== AccountCard 可傳參數 ====================
* 1. type -> 帳戶科目別 (ex: "004")
* 2. cardName -> 卡片名稱
* 3. accountNo -> 卡片帳號
* 4. balance -> 卡片餘額，輸入純數字即可，顯示時會自動加上貨幣符號及千分位逗點
* 5. color -> 卡片顏色，預設紫色
* 6. dollarSign -> 貨幣符號，預設為 '$'
* 8. annotation -> 金額旁的備註，如：以使用額度
* 9. ariaLabel -> title for button，預設為 cardName
* 10.onClick -> 點即時呼叫。
* 11.children
* 12.moreList -> 點擊更多圖標後彈出的更多功能清單，型別為陣列，組件 type 為 original 的卡片 (完整內容) 才需要傳入
* 13. functionList -> 卡片功能清單，型別為陣列，組件 type 為 original 的卡片 (完整內容) 才需要傳入
* */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var creditFormatter=function creditFormatter(account){return account?"".concat(account.slice(0,4),"-****-****-").concat(account.slice(12,16)):'-';};var AccountCard=function AccountCard(_ref){var _ref$type=_ref.type,type=_ref$type===void 0?'M':_ref$type,cardName=_ref.cardName,accountNo=_ref.accountNo,balance=_ref.balance,color=_ref.color,_ref$dollarSign=_ref.dollarSign,dollarSign=_ref$dollarSign===void 0?'NTD':_ref$dollarSign,annotation=_ref.annotation,ariaLabel=_ref.ariaLabel,onClick=_ref.onClick,children=_ref.children,onMoreClicked=_ref.onMoreClicked,functionList=_ref.functionList;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccountCardWrapper,{title:ariaLabel||cardName,$cardColor:color||accountOverviewCardVarient(type).color,onClick:onClick,children:children!==null&&children!==void 0?children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:cardName}),onMoreClicked&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"moreIconButton",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FEIBIconButton,{"aria-label":"\u5C55\u958B\u4E0B\u62C9\u5F0F\u9078\u55AE",onClick:onMoreClicked,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoreIcon,{})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:accountNo?creditFormatter(accountNo):"\xA0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:annotation}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"balance",children:"".concat(currencySymbolGenerator(dollarSign,Math.abs(balance)))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full",children:functionList})]})});};export default AccountCard;
